variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: COR2
variable.description: Has an official coroner's or medical examiner's report or another source of information from the coroner's or medical examiner's office been located?

variable.name: COR3
variable.description: Was an autopsy performed as part of the medical examiner (coroner) investigation?

variable.name: COR4A
variable.description: Did the coroner's report mention any of the following as contributing to or being present at death? Recent myocardial infarction

variable.name: COR4B
variable.description: Did the coroner's report mention any of the following as contributing to or being present at death? Coronary heart disease/ ischemic/ atherosclerotic heart disease (other than MI)

variable.name: COR4C
variable.description: Did the coroner's report mention any of the following as contributing to or being present at death? Hypertensive heart disease

variable.name: COR4D
variable.description: Did the coroner's report mention any of the following as contributing to or being present at death? Valvular heart disease

variable.name: COR4E
variable.description: Did the coroner's report mention any of the following as contributing to or being present at death? Other heart disease

variable.name: COR4F
variable.description: Did the coroner's report mention any of the following as contributing to or being present at death? Recent cerebral hemorrhage

variable.name: COR4G
variable.description: Did the coroner's report mention any of the following as contributing to or being present at death? Recent cerebral infarction

variable.name: COR4H
variable.description: Did the coroner's report mention any of the following as contributing to or being present at death? Recent cerebral embolus

variable.name: COR4I
variable.description: Did the coroner's report mention any of the following as contributing to or being present at death? Recent subarachnoid hemorrhage

variable.name: COR4J
variable.description: Did the coroner's report mention any of the following as contributing to or being present at death? Recent stroke, other or unspecified type

variable.name: COR5
variable.description: Was any non-cardiac, non-stroke finding mentioned as contributing to death?

variable.name: COR5A
variable.description: Was the finding: Kidney disease

variable.name: COR5B
variable.description: Was the finding: Chronic respiratory disease

variable.name: COR5C
variable.description: Was the finding: Psychiatric illness/depression

variable.name: COR5D
variable.description: Was the finding: Alcohol or drug addiction

variable.name: COR5E
variable.description: Was the finding: Epilepsy

variable.name: COR5F
variable.description: Was the finding: Liver disease

variable.name: COR5G
variable.description: Was the finding: Other

variable.name: COR6
variable.description: Do you have the final diagnoses?

variable.name: COR7
variable.description: Pick one of the following:
variable.value: Patient had symptoms but they were chronic

variable.name: COR8A
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before death, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Shortness of breath

variable.name: COR8B
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before death, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Dizziness

variable.name: COR8C
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before death, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Palpitations

variable.name: COR8D
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before death, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Marked or increased fatigue, tiredness or weakness

variable.name: COR8E
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before death, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Headache

variable.name: COR8F
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before death, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Sweating

variable.name: COR8G
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before death, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Paralysis

variable.name: COR8H
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before death, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Loss of speech

variable.name: COR8I
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before death, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Attack of indigestion or nausea or vomiting

variable.name: COR8J
variable.description: Within 3 days of death or just before death, did any of the following symptoms begin for the first time? Other

variable.name: COR9
variable.description: Was there an acute episode(s) of pain or discomfort anywhere in the chest, left arm or shoulder or jaw either just before death or within 72 hours of death?

variable.name: COR9A
variable.description: Did this pain or discomfort specifically involve the chest?

variable.name: COR9B
variable.description: Did the patient take or was she or he given nitrates at the time of the acute episode?

variable.name: COR9C
variable.description: Was the discomfort or pain diagnosed as having a non-cardiac origin?

variable.name: COR10
variable.description: Place of death (circle only one):
variable.value: On a bus or public transportation

variable.name: COR11
variable.description: Did anyone witness the death?

variable.name: COR12
variable.description: Time from onset of acute symptoms to death (or time since last known to be alive if no known acute symptoms) (Choose only one):

variable.name: COR13
variable.description: Is there a history of a myocardial infarction prior to the onset of this event?

variable.name: COR13A
variable.description: Did an MI occur within four weeks prior to this event?

variable.name: COR13B
variable.description: Was the deceased hospitalized for the MI?

variable.name: COR13C
variable.description: Do you know the hospital name?

variable.name: COR14
variable.description: Is there any history of angina pectoris or coronary insufficiency?

variable.name: COR15
variable.description: Is there a history of any other chronic ischemic heart disease?

variable.name: COR16
variable.description: Is there a history of valvular disease or cardiomyopathy?

variable.name: COR17
variable.description: Is there a history of coronary bypass surgery prior to this event?

variable.name: COR18
variable.description: Is there a history of coronary angioplasty prior to this event?

variable.name: COR19
variable.description: Is there a history of stroke prior to this event?

variable.name: COR19A
variable.description: Did a stroke occur within four weeks prior to this event?

variable.name: COR20
variable.description: Is there a history of hypertension (high blood pressure) prior to this event?

variable.name: COR21A
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications as an outpatient within the four weeks prior to death? Nitrates

variable.name: COR21B
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications as an outpatient within the four weeks prior to death? Calcium channel blockers

variable.name: COR21C
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications as an outpatient within the four weeks prior to death? Beta blockers

variable.name: COR21D
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications as an outpatient within the four weeks prior to death? Digitalis

variable.name: COR22
variable.description: Code number of person completing this form:

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time

variable.name: FSEQNO
variable.description: Form sequence number

variable.name: LINENO
variable.description: Line number

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data

variable.name: COR1FUT
variable.description: Date of death from death certificate:

variable.name: COR23FUT
variable.description: Date abstract completed:

variable.name: GARNETID
variable.description: GARNET ID
